content: If he goes back into this state when you don't have the fan available, it's just a matter of hanging back and avoiding attacks until he changes back to red.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Lang-Baw-Baw.md', within the main section titled 'Lang-Baw-Baw', specifically from the subsection 'Lang-Baw-Baw Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
If he goes back into this state when you don't have the fan available, it's just a matter of hanging back and avoiding attacks until he changes back to red.
